price: Whoever Allah guides is rightly guided; and whoever He causes to stray[78], it is they who are the losers.
arabic: مَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِيۖ وَمَن يُضۡلِلۡ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
footnotes: [78] Due to persistence in evil and rejecting the truth.
